RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $2,040 ATB) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000. Texas Bred Claiming Price $17,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIT'EM UP vied for the lead while three wide then dueled on the inside on the turn, was in a long drive and drew away then held sway in late stretch. CAT TALE SKY was settled then rallied three wide on the turn, was four wide in the stretch, was gaining ground and finished well but came up short. STELLA G vied for the early lead while inside then dropped back before the turn, rallied along the inside in the stretch and was no menace. POETIC UNION was unhurried early then made a mild rally while two wide in the stretch and was no threat. GRACES PACE vied for the early lead while four wide then dueled two wide on the turn, was in a long drive then gave way in the stretch. IN THE FAST LANE vied for the early lead while two wide, was used up then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Poetic Union
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally, 2 wide stretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Stella G
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, dropped back, rallied, stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: In the Fast Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 2 wide, used up, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Hit'em Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, dueled, inside, long drive, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Graces Pace
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 4 wide, dueled, 2w, long drive, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Tale Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied, 3 wide turn, 4w, stretch, gaining, finish well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 35000. (PLUS UP TO $5,950 ATB) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For A Claiming Price Of Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILVER CURRENCY dueled for the lead while well handled from the inside, drew away in upper stretch and was kept to task in the end. SWEET TRUFFLES was well placed while three wide on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn and was in a drive to be second best in the end. BODEFIDE dueled for the lead while two wide on the backstretch, was in a long drive then faltered in the stretch. LEXINGTON DIVA was allowed to settled while inside on the backstretch, made a bid in upper stretch and was no menace. CLAY'S CLOUD BURST stalked the pace while four wide on the backstretch, made a bid into the far turn but came up empty in late stretch. SWEET DYNASTY was unhurried early while inside on the backstretch and no threat. MARIA GONE WILD trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Maria Gone Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Currency
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside, well handled, drew off upper stretch, driving

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside backstretch, bid, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Dynasty
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, inside, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Bodefide
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide backstretch, long drive, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Truffles
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, 3w, backstretch, rallied, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Clay's Cloud Burst
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide backstretch, bid, empty late stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 15000. (PLUS UP TO $2,550 ATB) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 7, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. A Rac e Since November 7, 2022 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKYKAT stalked the pace while inside on the backstretch, saved ground on the far turn then rallied and moved out to be two wide for the stretch drive and powered to the front in late stretch. KATIE'S KARAT set a well handled pace from the start, was in a long drive in the stretch but weakened in late stretch. LIL ASHLEY B. was forced out on the first turn then settled on the backstretch, rallied four wide on the far turn and was gaining ground in late stretch to finished well. FADED MEMORIES was hustled along the inside on the backstretch, stalked the pace while two wide on the backstretch then faltered in the stretch drive. BRODIE BABY was allowed to settled while two wide on the backstretch then failed to menace in the stretch. FROSTY FLIRT stalked the pace while three wide on the backstretch, made a bid into the far turn then failed to respond in the stretch. SUPER LEGS was forced out on the first turn then raced three wide on the backstretch and was no threat. SHESMYBROKER bore out on the first turn then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Shesmybroker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out first turn, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Faded Memories
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, inside, stalked pace, 2w, bid, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, long drive, weakened late stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Ashley B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out first turn, settled, rallied, 4 wide 1/4 pole, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Skykat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, rallied, 2 wide stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Brodie Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide backstretch, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Frosty Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide backstretch, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Legs
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out first turn, 3 wide backstretch, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Darby's Daughter Division of the Clarence Scharbauer, Jr. Texas S SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Stakes Purse 90375. FOR FILLIES, THREE YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STELLIOT'S LEGACY dueled for the early lead while two wide into the turn, was inside in the stretch and gamely dug in and proved best in the end. IZATIZ was inside then shuffled back on the turn, angled out to be five wide in upper stretch and closed willingly in late stretch. WAVING BYE rallied three wide on the turn making a bid then flattened out in the drive. BLINGONMERCURY rallied four wide on the turn making a bid to upper stretch then flattened out in the end. THE NEXT BIG BLING was between rivals on the turn then failed to menace. COME TO THE PARTY dueled for the lead from the inside, was used up then gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO $1,700 ATB) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Texas Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PEARL'S CODE was pinched back at the start then settled, rallied five wide on the turn and was in a strong drive to powered to the front in late stretch. LET FREEDOM BLING set the pace from the start, drew off in upper stretch then was in a long drive but could not last in late stretch. MO SILVER rallied three wide on the turn making a strong bid to mid stretch but hung in late stretch. UTSIRA was unhurried early then rallied three wide on the turn, made a mild gain in late stretch but was no menace. BLONDES HAVEMO FUN was saving ground on the turn then made a bid but was no menace in the stretch. HONEY CREEK was unhurried early and inside on the turn then was no threat. ALLINFORTUNE chased the early pace while three wide, was used up then stopped. SHESABITSNAKEY pressed the early pace while two wide into the turn, was used up and stopped.

DUDE PERFECTA was unhurried early and failed to menace. TEXAS SKYWALKER raced five wide on the turn and was no factor. SR. BI BI had early speed while inside and faltered. REQUISITION was unhurried early and was no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SAM HOUSTON RACE PARK RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37000. (PLUS UP TO $6,290 ATB) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR TEXAS BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 7, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 7, 2022 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRULY DANZIG was settled early while inside, rallied and moved out to be four wide on the far turn, was in a strong drive and powered to the front in late stretch. PEACOCK KITTEN was allowed to settled in the early going, rallied and was three wide on the far turn, was gaining ground and finished well to be second best. GO SPEED RACER GO vied for the lead while two wide on the backstretch, was in a long drive and inside in the stretch but weakened in late stretch. FRED'STWIRLINCANDY vied for the early lead while three wide on the backstretch, was settled back into the far turn then failed to menace in the stretch drive. PERFECT STAR vied for the lead while three wide on the backstretch, was in a long drive then faltered in the stretch drive. CAUSE TO CRUISE was unhurried early then failed to menace. DRIFTING WEST vied for the lead while inside on the backstretch, dropped back on the far turn and bore out in the stretch then stopped. SUNRISE KITTEN was unhurried early and was no factor.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLING BLING BLING vied for the early lead while inside, drew off in late stretch and handily dealt with this field in convincing fashion. JUST WHISKEY was settled then rallied four wide on the turn, was gaining ground in late stretch to be along for the place. MY FAVORITE SONG was three wide into the turn then angled inside on the turn to saved ground, rallied and was three wide in the stretch but was out finished for the place in the end. I'M A COWBOY chased the early pace while three wide into the turn, made a bid then faltered in the drive. LITTLE JONY was allowed to settled then raced two wide on the turn and failed to menace. TAKE MY MONEY was inside on the turn and failed to menace. STREETSTER was unruly in the post parade then dueled for the lead while two wide, was used up and stopped.

MARVINS' WARRIOR stalked the pace while inside, was used up then faltered. TOP HONORS was unhurried early while inside on the turn and no threat. CAJUN FIRE showed brief speed and stopped. DREAMS ROCKETMAN raced four wide on the turn and stopped. NIGHT GUARD dwelt at the start and trailed throughout.
